info.title: db-specialrequestmanagement-service API
info.description: Handles special requests raised by hotel guests and staff, enabling CRUD operations on special guest requests linked to reservations. Both public guest (via reservation code) and staff operations are supported. Includes workflow for request creation, fulfillment, cancellation, and staff response.

201.description: Response JSON represents the most comprehensive form of the **specialRequest** object in the response. However, some properties may be omitted based on the object's internal logic.

400.description: The request was improperly formatted or contained invalid parameters, preventing the server from processing it.

401.description: The request lacked valid authentication credentials or the credentials provided do not grant access to the requested resource.

404.description: The requested resource was not found on the server.

500.description: The server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request.
